title: EVEDESIGN Mens Bell Bottom Velvet Pants 60s 70s Disco Outfits for Men Vintage Flared Jeans
description: Comfortable Fit: Crafted from high-quality Velvet materials, fine texture, soft feel. The relaxed silhouette allows for effortless movement, while the soft fabric ensures all-day comfort.

Fashionable Design: These classic denim bell bottoms feature a traditional zipper fly, button closure, flared legs, mid-rise waist, 5 pockets, and a stretch fit design for a stylish and charming look.
Description: Embrace the 70s tradition with these retro-inspired bell bottom jeans. Each pair is carefully selected and modified to create a unique addition to your wardrobe.
Occasions: Perfect for 60s/70s themed parties, disco events, dancing, streetwear, casual outings, Halloween costumes, stage performances, and balls.

Garment Care: For best results, handwash or machine wash these Bell Bottom pants. Avoid using bleach and opt for low ironing if needed to maintain the quality of the garment. Do not bleach, gentle cycle, flat or line dry only.PLEASE SEPARATE FROM OTHER CLOTHES DUE TO SLIGHT FADE
